name: .ANB File Extension
summary: Learn about .ANB files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open an ANB file in IBM i2 Analyst's Notebook (Windows) or IMB i2 Chart Reader (Windows). Chart Reader is a free application that allows users to view the chart an ANB file contains. However, users must create an IBM account before they can download Chart Reader.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
